<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset downscales national and subnational statistics based on the spatial variability of gridded data on environmental and socio-economic drivers. This is achieved through a Random Forest modeling framework, and results on several layers with per-pixel frequencies of individual types of livestock, such as cattle, horses, and chickens. The dataset also provides the original statitical data in gridded form.
</p>
